Corrected_Requirement: The code shall achieve a Cyclomatic Complexity score of less than [INSERT_NUMBER].

Requirement: Because of the budget, the cloud costs must be low.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The monthly cloud infrastructure cost shall not exceed [INSERT_CURRENCY_VALUE].

Requirement: To help new users, the tutorial should be easy.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The tutorial shall guide the user through the [INSERT_CORE_TASK] within [INSERT_TIME].

Requirement: As the server is weak, the memory usage should be minimized.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The application memory footprint shall not exceed [INSERT_SIZE] RAM.

Requirement: Because security is a priority, passwords must be strong.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The system shall enforce a password policy of [INSERT_NUMBER] characters, including special characters.

Requirement: To improve SEO, the pages should load fast.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The webpage Time to Interactive (TTI) shall be less than [INSERT_TIME].

Requirement: Since users make mistakes, the system needs undo.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The system shall allow users to undo the last [INSERT_NUMBER] actions.

Requirement: Because of compliance, the audit trail must be complete.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The audit trail shall record Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) events for all entities.

Requirement: To support decision making, the dashboard should be insightful.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The dashboard shall display real-time metrics for [INSERT_METRIC_A] and [INSERT_METRIC_B].

Requirement: As the traffic varies, the system should auto-scale.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The system shall scale out when CPU utilization exceeds [INSERT_PERCENTAGE].

Requirement: Because it is a mobile app, the touch targets should be big enough.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: Interactive touch targets shall have a minimum size of 44x44 pixels.

Requirement: To prevent data loss, backups should be frequent.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The system shall perform incremental backups every [INSERT_TIME].

Requirement: Since the inventory fluctuates, the stock count must be accurate.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The displayed stock count shall reflect the physical inventory with [INSERT_PERCENTAGE] accuracy.

Requirement: Because of high latency, the video should buffer.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The video player shall buffer at least [INSERT_TIME] of content before playback.

Requirement: To ensure compatibility, the API should use standards.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The API shall adhere to the REST architectural style and use JSON for data interchange.

Requirement: Since the user might be colorblind, the contrast should be high.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The UI text shall maintain a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 against the background.

Requirement: Because of heavy load, the system shall not freeze.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The system shall maintain a heartbeat response every [INSERT_TIME] under maximum load.

Requirement: To make it modern, the design should be flat.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The UI shall utilize the design tokens defined in the [INSERT_DESIGN_SYSTEM].

Requirement: As the data is sensitive, access should be restricted.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: Access to the [INSERT_DATA_TYPE] shall be restricted to users with the [INSERT_ROLE] role.

Requirement: Because the printer is slow, the print job should be queued.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The print spooler shall verify queue capacity does not exceed [INSERT_NUMBER] jobs.

Requirement: To avoid spam, the form should verify the user.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The form shall require a successful reCAPTCHA v3 response before submission.

Requirement: Since the screen is small, the menu should collapse.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The navigation bar shall collapse into a hamburger menu at widths below [INSERT_PIXELS]px.

Requirement: Because of timezones, the dates should be standard.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: All timestamps shall be stored in UTC ISO 8601 format.

Requirement: To keep users happy, the support should be quick.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: Support tickets shall receive a first response within [INSERT_TIME] (SLA).

Requirement: As the logic is complex, the code should be documented.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: Public methods shall include Javadoc/Docstrings describing parameters and return values.

Requirement: Because of reliability, the system shall have redundancy.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The database shall run in a High Availability (HA) cluster with [INSERT_NUMBER] nodes.

Requirement: To assist the user, the search should offer suggestions.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The search bar shall display [INSERT_NUMBER] auto-complete suggestions after 3 characters are typed.

Requirement: Since files can be large, the download should be resumable.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The file server shall support the HTTP 'Range' header to allow resumable downloads.

Requirement: Because the user is admin, they should have full access.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The Admin role shall have Create, Read, Update, and Delete permissions on [INSERT_RESOURCE].

Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: Database transactions shall timeout and roll back after [INSERT_TIME].

Requirement: As the API is public, it should be rate limited.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: The API shall limit clients to [INSERT_NUMBER] requests per minute.

Requirement: Because of branding, the logo should be prominent.
Label: YES

Requirement: To ensure freshness, the cache should expire.
Label: YES
Corrected_Requirement: Cached content shall have a Time-To-Live (TTL) of [INSERT_TIME].
